channel.title: azure on My learning and diary
channel.description: Recent content in azure on My learning and diary

item.title: Export resources and reconstruct resources in azure
item.description: My credit of Visual Studio Professional Subscription azure is $50. In the past two days, I activated my subscription. I didn’t go IaC way to setup my POC environment as I did’t have enough time to do that. After I setup more services, the 10 credit is used. It can be quickly used up if resources are kept running. I know there is a way to import existing resources as I used terraform in the past.

item.title: Change appsettings.json without restart in app service
item.description: Nowadays, zero downtime is normal, you can’t believe that in azure app service changes in "app settings", App Service triggers an app restart. The alternative ways to do avoid that is to use sentinel key with App Configuration. however App Configuration will cost a little. Do we really need to use App Configuration to achieve that ? The naive and obvious way is that changing appsettings.json files via entering the app services using kudo console.

item.title: Learning Microsoft azure or google cloud
item.description: Today when I leant SRE course from cloudskillsboost, the first course is google cloud foundation. SRE is great. cloudskillsboost should be best place to learn SRE as it is originated there.
